title: My league of legends won't start.
body:
My league of legends won't start.I play the client a couple of days and then the client won't start.I have a solution to this:unnistall and install.But i have to wait  mutch time that the client finish installing so,please say me a solution.

Thanks!

replies.body: Are you seeing a specific error when you're unable to start the client? Try launching the client using the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (right-click, *run as administrator*) and let me know if you notice any changes.
Yeah,the error is: failed to launch RADS/system/rads_user_kernel.exe. And i try it with lol launcher admin and it won't start.

It sounds like your installation of League may be pretty messed up, then. Before resorting to another reinstall, I'd like to escalate this to our [**tech team**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can see if there's any other solution. I recommend attaching some [**hextech logs**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to your ticket so your service times are quicker.

If you run into issues let me know.
I'm having the same issue. I don't want to uninstall and reinstall because it takes forever to install. I even tried using the Hextech Repair tool and still doesn't work. Not sure what to do now.
